information: A block that crusher modded fruit with infused coal to make superior ingots
One of the only way to obtain endium

To make a ingot insert enough mixed coal with the right fruit to make the progressbar go higher When the progressbar is at it maximun you can extract ( click on the buttons ) the ingot from the machine
When the progressbar is superior to one but not a it max You can also try to extract the ingot but it will not will be a 100% chance you obtain the ingot
